short_description: kriechstroeme – ingna – ingenieurbüro für nachhaltigkeit is an environmental engineering services company based in lucerne, switzerland.
long_description: erstes schweizer sonderingenieurbüro seit 2001 die erste ansprechstelle im bereich gesundes wohnen & arbeiten. messtechnik und beratung ist unsere leidenschaft. begleitung wir unterstützen sie gerne bei der sanierung oder planung ihres baus. in der regel antworten wir innert 24h auf ihre anfrage.
generated_description: kriechstroeme is a company based in baar, zug, specializing in building forensics and moisture and mold measurement. established in 2001, it is recognized by the swiss federal office of public health as a building forensic expert. the company provides year-round measurement services for architects, builders, and private individuals, focusing on ensuring healthy living and working environments. kriechstroeme employs advanced techniques, including luminescence and optical building forensics, to detect and analyze moisture and mold issues. the company is a member of several professional organizations, including the swiss federal office of public health and the swiss association of building pollutants.
